name: RES
description:
A small indoor playground where you - a playful ghost that possesses objects - can explore freely. You mostly only need a mouse to play. 

This is a very small, limited prototype with minimal content, as it was created in only 72 hours for the Halloween Jam 2021. It was original intended to be a time trials style game, with environmental puzzles, and I’d love to expand it further outside the Jam.

Mouse to look

Left click to move

Right click to switch objects  (Red objects only)

Esc to return to menu

(Bronze objects can be pushed but not possessed)

(No SFX or music as I ran out of time)

NOTE:  The WebGL build has broken lighting, but gives a taste of the gameplay, the Mac build has full lighting and effects but is very slow and the Windows build is untested, so feedback would be appreciated on that.

RES is Latin for ‘things’, ‘objects’, or ‘matter’.
